issue.title: GUI overlay is not shown unless you point at the widget with mouse

content.raw: Olzhas, is it just the GUI layout that gitters for you? or when you move your robot does the whole gazebo world window (not including the side panels of the gazebo GUI window) jitter as well? I have this problem and it seems similar to yours. Not sure if the gazebo5 fix takes care of this though.
